data.name: Chart_ApplyTemplate
data.value: <ControlTemplate xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:vc="clr-namespace:Visifire.Charts;assembly=WPFVisifire.Charts" TargetType="vc:Chart"> <Border x:Name="ChartBorder" Background="Transparent"> <Grid Name="RootElement" Background="Yellow" Width="Auto" Height="Auto" Margin="0,0,0,0" > </Grid></Border></ControlTemplate>
data.comment: This is the template applied to chart.

data.name: Chart_AxisXaml
data.value: <vc:Chart Height="300" Width="400" Margin="0,0,0,0" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:vc="clr-namespace:Visifire.Charts;assembly=WPFVisifire.Charts"> <vc:Chart.AxesX><vc:Axis Interval="10" AxisMinimum="1" AxisMaximum="100" /></vc:Chart.AxesX> <vc:Chart.AxesY><vc:Axis AxisMaximum="200" AxisMinimum="0" Interval="20"/></vc:Chart.AxesY> <vc:Chart.Series><vc:DataSeries><vc:DataSeries.DataPoints><vc:DataPoint AxisXLabel="a" XValue="10" YValue="10"/><vc:DataPoint AxisXLabel="b" XValue="20" YValue="20"/><vc:DataPoint AxisXLabel="c" XValue="30" YValue="15"/><vc:DataPoint AxisXLabel="d" XValue="40" YValue="30"/><vc:DataPoint AxisXLabel="e" XValue="50" YValue="20"/></vc:DataSeries.DataPoints></vc:DataSeries></vc:Chart.Series> </vc:Chart>
data.comment: This XAML fragment is used to test Chart Axis when it is loaded.

data.name: Chart_CustomTemplate
data.value: <ControlTemplate xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:vc="clr-namespace:Visifire.Charts;assembly=WPFVisifire.Charts" TargetType="vc:Chart"> <Border x:Name="ChartBorder" Background="Transparent"> <Grid x:Name="RootElement" Background="Red" Width="Auto" Height="Auto" Margin="0,0,0,0" > </Grid> </Border></ControlTemplate>

data.name: Chart_DefaultDataSeries
data.value: <vc:DataSeries xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:vc="clr-namespace:Visifire.Charts;assembly=WPFVisifire.Charts"><vc:DataSeries.DataPoints><vc:DataPoint XValue="1" YValue="10"/><vc:DataPoint XValue="2" YValue="20"/><vc:DataPoint XValue="3" YValue="15"/><vc:DataPoint XValue="4" YValue="30"/><vc:DataPoint XValue="5" YValue="20"/></vc:DataSeries.DataPoints></vc:DataSeries>
data.comment: This is a Default DataSeries used for Testing via XAML.

data.name: Chart_DefaultXaml
data.value: <vc:Chart Height="300" Width="400" Margin="0,0,0,0" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:vc="clr-namespace:Visifire.Charts;assembly=WPFVisifire.Charts"> <vc:Chart.Titles> <vc:Title HorizontalAlignment="Center" FontSize="18" FontColor="#FFD6C8C8" Background="#FF934141"/> </vc:Chart.Titles> <vc:Chart.Series><vc:DataSeries><vc:DataSeries.DataPoints><vc:DataPoint XValue="1" YValue="10"/><vc:DataPoint XValue="2" YValue="20"/><vc:DataPoint XValue="3" YValue="15"/><vc:DataPoint XValue="4" YValue="30"/><vc:DataPoint XValue="5" YValue="20"/></vc:DataSeries.DataPoints></vc:DataSeries></vc:Chart.Series> </vc:Chart>
data.comment: This is the default XAML used in testing.

data.name: Chart_EmptyTemplate
data.value: <ControlTemplate xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:vc="clr-namespace:Visifire.Charts;assembly=WPFVisifire.Charts" TargetType="vc:Chart"> <Grid Background="Yellow" Width="Auto" Height="Auto" Margin="0,0,0,0" > <Border Background="Transparent" Width="Auto" Height="Auto" /><StackPanel Canvas.ZIndex="9000" Name="CenterPanel" Background="Transparent" Width="500" Height="300"/> </Grid> </ControlTemplate>

data.name: Chart_TitleContentPropertyXaml
data.value: <vc:Chart Height="300" Width="400" Margin="0,0,0,0" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:vc="clr-namespace:Visifire.Charts;assembly=WPFVisifire.Charts"> <vc:Chart.Titles> <vc:Title Text="Chart Title" HorizontalAlignment="Center" FontSize="18" FontColor="#FFD6C8C8" Background="#FFF54E4E" /> </vc:Chart.Titles> </vc:Chart>
data.comment: This is used to test Title element in chart via XAML.

data.name: DateTimeXaml
data.value: <vc:DataSeries xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:vc="clr-namespace:Visifire.Charts;assembly=WPFVisifire.Charts" XValueType="DateTime"><vc:DataSeries.DataPoints><vc:DataPoint XValue="1/1/2001" YValue="10"/><vc:DataPoint XValue="2/1/2001" YValue="20"/><vc:DataPoint XValue="3/1/2001" YValue="15"/><vc:DataPoint XValue="4/1/2001" YValue="30"/><vc:DataPoint XValue="5/1/2001" YValue="20"/><vc:DataPoint XValue="8/1/2001" YValue="20"/></vc:DataSeries.DataPoints></vc:DataSeries>

data.name: Title_ShortText
data.comment: Short text used for testing chart title.
